name: pricing-component-10
description: Simplified two-tier pricing with emphasis on value proposition and clear call-to-action buttons.

files.content:
import { CircleCheckIcon } from 'lucide-react' import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge' import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button' import { Card, CardContent } from '@/components/ui/card' import { cn } from '@/lib/utils' type Plans = { name: string price: number badge: string | null }[] type Features = { title: string description: string }[] const Pricing = ({ plans, features }: { plans: Plans; features: Features }) => { return (
PRICING

Gain A Competitive Edge With Better UI!

Gain A Competitive Edge With Better UI!

Access All Features

provides you with the tools & resources you need to build a stunning e-commerce site, portfolio, or dashboard for your business.

{plans.map((plan, index) => (

{plan.name}

{plan.badge && {plan.badge}}
${plan.price} /month
))}
{features.map((feature, idx) => (
{feature.title}: {feature.description}
))}
) } export default Pricing
